name: Contact Form Multi-Step Addon
author: ThemeREX

sections.description:
WordPress Plugin by ThemeREX extends the functionality of Contact Form 7. It adds a Multi-Step opportunities without reloading the page. The visitor can fill out the form step-by-step. Also the form adds additional shortcodes to Contact Form 7. Now you have shortcodes of step start and step end, progress bar, next and previous buttons.

Key advantages

Responsive design. It’s optimized to be viewed perfectly on different devices.

A well thought-out shortcode settings. New elements are simply built in into your Contact Form 7.

No Reloads. The visitors does not have to reload the page for the next/previous step.

Fast. Doesn’t slow down the site. Plugin zip itself is just 17kb.

Main features

  • Quick Installation
  • Easy to Use
  • Additional buttons
  • Responsive
  • Multi-Step with no page reload

Plugin Usage

  1. Navigate Contact – Contact Forms.
  2. Add new or edit existent form.
  3. Separate steps by Step Start and Step Finish shortcodes.
  4. And next and previous buttons by adding Next and Prev Shortcodes on proper steps.
  5. You may also add a form filling Progress Bar by adding a progressbar shortcode.

Tested with Themes

ShiftCV Resume Theme

Gutentype Gutenberg Blog

Vagabonds Travel Theme

Credits

Plugin bundles the following third-party resources:
* jQuery UI, Copyright (c) 2013 jQuery Foundation and other contributors Licensed MIT
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress. You’ll find ‘Contact Form Multi-Step Addon’ on your main WordPress dashboard.
sections.changelog:
1.0.8

  • Fixed
    • Compatibility with latest version of contact form 7

1.0.2

  • Fixed
    • Required file validation

1.0.0

  • Release

short_description: Enables the Contact Form 7 plugin to create multi-step forms, adds new shortcodes.
